title: With this Google Chrome update, the browser should stop draining your battery life
description: Google is now rolling out the new energy saver and memory saver modes for Chrome

title: How to use the Samsung Galaxy S23's new magical Photoshop-like trick
description: I wouldn't say Samsung copied this iPhone feature, but it did appear on the iPhone first. Still, it's pretty darn cool.

title: This $75 dock turns your Mac Mini into a Mac Studio (sort of)
description: Satechi's Stand & Hub for Mac Mini can greatly expand your available ports while offering a stealthy way to add more storage, all without ruining your ultra-clean setup.

title: Linux 6.2: The first mainstream Linux kernel for Apple M1 chips arrives
description: Linux is now ready to run on modern Macs.

title: Bing's AI chatbot has a question limit that is more of a problem than a solution
description: After reports of the Bing chatbot's outlandish behavior, Microsoft has decided to limit the interactions users can have with the bot. The results are quite annoying.

title: SparkyLinux is a no-frills Linux distribution anyone can use
description: If you're looking for a desktop operating system that focuses more on ease of use and getting work done, and less on frills, SparkyLinux might be what you're looking for.

title: How to enable Ubuntu Pro to gain 10 years of security for your desktop
description: Ubuntu Pro gives your desktop Linux operating system 10 years of security updates, so that it can go an entire decade on the same release. Find out how easy it is to enable this feature.

title: How to take complete control over iOS and iPadOS updates
description: Your iPhone and iPad have a hidden menu that gives you more options about when a software update will be downloaded and installed. Here’s what you need to know.

title: Testing RFID blocking cards: Do they work? Do you need one?
description: Credit and debit cards -- along with other types of cards like IDs -- contain RFID contactless technology. Can an RFID blocking card keep someone from "reading" your card without your knowledge? We put it to the test.

title: Want to succeed in software? Look beyond Silicon Valley
description: Every industry has its pain points that require technology professionals to step forward.

title: This is the perfect mini electric screwdriver
description: I haven't been a big fan of electric screwdrivers in the past but this tiny one changed all that.

title: The best AI chatbots of 2023: ChatGPT and alternatives
description: AI chatbots and writers can help lighten your workload by writing emails and essays and even doing math. They use artificial intelligence to generate text or answer queries based on user input. ChatGPT is one popular example, but there are other noteworthy chatbots.

title: OnePlus' latest concept phone has icy blue 'blood vessels' that glow
description: The OnePlus 11 Concept will be unveiled at Mobile World Congress on February 27.

title: 5 hidden features on the new Samsung Galaxy S23 and S23 Ultra
description: From Adobe Lightroom integration to the Bixby Text Call, here are five Samsung Galaxy S23 features that have been flying under everyone's radars.

title: How to protect your Twitter account without SMS two-factor authentication
description: Unless you're a Twitter Blue subscriber, you'll soon lose access to text-message two-factor authentication. But don't worry. There are better ways to secure your account.

title: Why is Twitter turning millions of accounts into defenseless targets?
description: Twitter is removing an essential security feature, putting millions of accounts at risk.

title: This Raspberry Pi running a 5G network could be the answer to your networking needs
description: Vodafone showcases a prototype 5G network which is highly portable, secure and cost effective.

title: SpaceX tests global Starlink roaming service for $200 a month
description: A Starlink global roaming service is on the way, according to emails sent to some customers.

title: Long chats confuse Bing Chat, so Microsoft's ChatGPT-powered bot is getting new limits
description: Bing Chat won't be able to hold a conversation for so long because Microsoft does't want it being confused by all our questions.

title: Raspberry Pi just launched a handy new $12 tool. Here's what it can do
description: Raspberry Pi gets a dedicated Debug Probe that has more uses, too.

title: The Asus VivoBook 13 Slate 2-in-1 laptop is 41% off on Amazon
description: You can enjoy $240 off the VivoBook's usual RRP while stocks last.

title: How to save $200 on the GoPro Hero 11 action camera
description: Don't pay full price for the GoPro Hero 11. We found where you can save $200 on the action cam. And it's not at Best Buy or Amazon.

title: The Asus Chromebook C425 just dropped to less than $200 on Amazon
description: You can save 33% off the typical RRP on a thin, light Chromebook ahead of President's Day.
